synopsis.text: As a dedicated salaryman, Nakano's life is consumed by the relentless demands of his job, leaving him perpetually exhausted. But when an 800-year-old fox girl named Senko-san unexpectedly appears in his life, she vows to alleviate his stress and restore his weary soul. With her tender care, Senko-san takes on the role of a loving wife and nurturing mother, providing Nakano with delicious meals, impeccable housekeeping, and comforting companionship. Despite her youthful appearance and playful demeanor, Senko-san is a powerful and wise fox deity who can see the darkness within humans caused by stress. By taking care of Nakano, she aims to rid him of this darkness and bring joy back into his life. As Nakano learns to accept Senko-san's pampering and embrace the unexpected turn his life has taken, he must also navigate the potential misunderstandings and judgments from those around him. Will Nakano find the peace and happiness he deserves with Senko-san by his side? Only time will tell in this heartwarming and comedic tale of love, healing, and the power of connection.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
